title: Mixed shellfish and pasta salad
ingredients: ['500 g (1 lb 2 oz) live mussels', '75 ml (2½ fl oz) white wine', 'Juice of 1-2 lemons', 'Salt and black pepper', '250 g (9 oz) pasta shapes, such as fusilli (spirals) or farfalle (butterflies)', '50 g (1¾ oz) peeled, cooked prawns, defrosted if frozen', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '50 g (1¾ oz) fresh flat-leaved parsley, finely chopped', '4 spring onions, chopped']
